panels.description: Number of profiled attributes (with fingerprints) in the AI DB for each namespace. (It can have non-integer values, probably due to Thanos compression of past measurements)
panels.title: Attributes in AI DBs per namespace

panels.description: Number of feedback from users processed in total for each namespace.
panels.title: Feedbacks processed in total per namespace

panels.description: Number of instances of each microservice running at given time for a given cluster and namespace. BEWARE: The dashboards are not prepared for multiple instances of the same microservice running in parallel!
panels.title: Number of instances of each microservice running at given time

panels.description: What versions of services are used at given cluster.
panels.title: Distribution of microservices versions in current cluster

panels.description: What versions of services are used at given cluster and namespace.
panels.title: Services versions in cluster and namespace

panels.description: Number of profiled attributes (with fingerprints) in the AI DB.
panels.title: Attributes in AI DB

panels.description: How much filled is the Neighbors index (relative to its  configured capacity). If it reaches 100%, the microservice stop working and the capacity will need to be increased (together with memory requirements of the service).
panels.title: Index fill

panels.description: Number of terms for which AI suggestions are disabled / number of terms we could theoretically provide suggestions for.
panels.title: Percentage of disabled terms

panels.description: How many profiled attributes do have at least one term assigned.
panels.title: Percentage of attributes with assignments

panels.description: Durations of various DB queries.
panels.title: DB operations durations

panels.description: How often is the recommendation process restarted, per hour (i.e. all the suggestions need to be recomputed because there is some change in underlying data).
panels.title: Recommendation starts per hour

panels.description: How many attributes do not have up-to-date suggestions - they should be eventually recomputed. [There is currently a bug in this metric so this number does not have to go to 0]
panels.title: Attributes with outdated suggestions

panels.description: Number of attributes for which neighbors were calculated per second spent in the query.
panels.title: Rate of neighbors calculation

panels.description: Number of processed attributes (i.e. their suggestions are recomputed) per second (of real time). Note: This is an underestimation because the processing might not run all the time, but the time is still taken into account.
panels.title: Rate of attribute processing

panels.description: Average number of suggestions suggested per attribute.
panels.title: Suggestions per attribute

panels.description: How many attributes are in the database (including deleted), index and what is the index limit.
panels.title: Database and index fill

panels.description: Statistics derived from the confusion matrix.

panels.title: Confusion matrix derivations

panels.description:
Confusion matrix of the term suggestions process. false_negative: We should be suggesting (term is already assigned manually), but we are not.
 false_positive: We probably shouldn't be suggesting (no term was manually assigned), but we are [This number can be overestimated!]
true_negative: We are probably correctly not suggesting as there are no terms assigned [This number can be underestimated!]
true_positive: We are correctly suggesting and the term was manually confirmed = assigned.

targets.expr: sum(ataccama_one_aicore_ai_ts_recommender_suggestions_confusion_matrix{clusterName=~"$cluster", namespace=~"$namespace"} / ignoring(entry) group_left sum(ataccama_one_aicore_ai_ts_recommender_suggestions_confusion_matrix{clusterName=~"$cluster", namespace=~"$namespace"}) without(entry)) without(pod, instance)

sum(ataccama_one_aicore_recommender_suggestions_confusion_matrix{clusterName=~"$cluster", namespace=~"$namespace"} / ignoring(entry) group_left sum(ataccama_one_aicore_recommender_suggestions_confusion_matrix{clusterName=~"$cluster", namespace=~"$namespace"}) without(entry)) without(pod, instance)

sum(ataccama_one_term_suggestions_recommender__suggestions_confusion_matrix{clusterName=~"$cluster", namespace=~"$namespace"} / ignoring(entry) group_left sum(ataccama_one_term_suggestions_recommender__suggestions_confusion_matrix{clusterName=~"$cluster", namespace=~"$namespace"}) without(entry)) without(pod, instance)

panels.title: Confusion matrix

targets.expr: sum(increase(ataccama_one_aicore_ai_ts_neighbors_neighbors_distances_bucket{k="$neighbor", clusterName=~"$cluster", namespace=~"$namespace"}[$__rate_interval])  / ignoring(le) group_left increase(ataccama_one_aicore_ai_ts_neighbors_neighbors_distances_count{k="$neighbor", clusterName=~"$cluster", namespace=~"$namespace"}[$__rate_interval])) without(pod, instance)

sum(increase(ataccama_one_aicore_neighbors_neighbors_distances_bucket{k="$neighbor", clusterName=~"$cluster", namespace=~"$namespace"}[$__rate_interval])  / ignoring(le) group_left increase(ataccama_one_aicore_neighbors_neighbors_distances_count{k="$neighbor", clusterName=~"$cluster", namespace=~"$namespace"}[$__rate_interval])) without(pod, instance)

sum(increase(ataccama_one_term_suggestions_neighbors__neighbors_distances_bucket{k="$neighbor", clusterName=~"$cluster", namespace=~"$namespace"}[$__rate_interval])  / ignoring(le) group_left increase(ataccama_one_term_suggestions_neighbors__neighbors_distances_count{k="$neighbor", clusterName=~"$cluster", namespace=~"$namespace"}[$__rate_interval])) without(pod, instance)

targets.expr: ataccama_one_aicore_ai_ts_feedback_feedbacks_total{clusterName=~"$cluster", namespace=~"$namespace", type="positive"} / ignoring(type) (ataccama_one_aicore_ai_ts_feedback_feedbacks_total{clusterName=~"$cluster", namespace=~"$namespace", type="positive"} + ignoring(type) ataccama_one_aicore_ai_ts_feedback_feedbacks_total{clusterName=~"$cluster", namespace=~"$namespace", type="negative"}) * 100
